resources.string: Report pre-trip vehicle issue to dispatch
Driver road test knowledge review \u0026 quiz
Procedure: You will step on the brake pedal, wait 5 seconds, then release. A confirmation will be presented at the end of the test for each wheel below in green (pass) or red (fail).

The sensors and their location at each wheel are indicated below in yellow black circles. After the test is complete, they will indicate greet (pass) or red (fail) for one or more wheel on your vehicle.
Procedure: You will step on the brake pedal, wait 5 seconds, then release. A confirmation will be presented for each wheel below in green (pass) or red (fail).
